plugins.name: using-chrome-directly
plugins.description: BETA: VERY LIGHTLY TESTED - Direct Chrome DevTools Protocol access. Skill mode (17 CLI commands) + MCP mode (single use_browser tool). Zero dependencies, auto-starts Chrome, minimal context usage.

plugins.name: elements-of-style
plugins.description: Writing guidance based on William Strunk Jr.'s The Elements of Style (1918) - foundational rules for clear, concise, grammatically correct writing
